channel.title: Please help fast!
channel.description:
When i type ::bank look what happens :(
[code] [client-3-[gm]mont]: playerCommand: bank java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -4 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:12569) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:22466) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16920) at client.process(client.java:16892) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:97) awesomepk[fatal] - exception[/code] Please help me!! :(
